co.paralleluniverse.galaxy

Interface Messenger


  • public interface Messenger
    The grid's messaging service. All messages are guaranteed delivery in the order they've been sent.

    • Method Summary

      • createTopic

        long createTopic()
        Returns a new topic. This topic will be unique among all invocations of this method in a JVM instance.
